title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Multimedia Resource Utilization Strategies for Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to design online classes utilizing diverse multimedia resources (text, images, videos)
Learners develop strategies for selecting multimedia resources that align with their cognitive learning styles (visual/auditory/reading-writing/kinesthetic).
Learners design at least three effective multimedia learning activities implementable in smartphone environments.
Learners iteratively improve their instructional designs through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
